MCTS thinking time 5s vs MiniMax of depth 7 (MCTS plays as 1)

1 wins!

Notes on game: Again MCTS won, this time the depth of the MiniMax was chosen so the thinking times were comparable. The depth 7 MiniMax played surpisingly poorly compared to the depth 4 version of itself.
